thread.title: Newswire: Sneaky Pete makes off with a season two renewal
thread.title_full: Newswire: Sneaky Pete makes off with a season two renewal

author: Danette Chavez
title: Newswire: Sneaky Pete makes off with a season two renewal
text:
Jan 19, 2017 3:47 PM Photo: Amazon Share Tweet 
Though it’s only had about a week to grow on folks, Sneaky Pete ’ s already picked up a season two renewal from Amazon Studios. The crime drama comes from executive producers Graham Yost and Bryan Cranston, the latter of whom originally pitched the pilot to CBS with David Shore. It stars Giovanni Ribisi as Marius/Pete, a con man trying to get one over on beloved character actress Margo Martindale (which we simply won’t stand for) and a crime boss played by Cranston. 
The first season’s been a bit of a bumpy ride, but Amazon Studios wants to see more. Joe Lewis, head of comedy and drama, said the streaming company took into account the “the critical response” and subscriber engagement in making the decision. This gives Sony Pictures Television a 1-for-2 record with Amazon, which pulled the plug on the Good Girls Revolt earlier this year.
